        @GetMapping(value="/meta-token/{tokenName:^[A-Za-z0-9.-]*$}")
 @Timed
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<TokenDTO> getTokenByTokenName(@PathVariable(value="tokenName")
                                                                                                                                                   java.lang.String tokenName)
                                                                                                                                            throws java.net.MalformedURLException
        GET /api/meta-token/:tokenName.

        Get refresh-token available under this tokenName.

        Parameters:
        tokenName - the tokenName given after pairing the subject with client
        Returns:
        the client as a ClientPairInfoDTO
